root.text: Raindrop keeps falling on my head
root.desc: Raindrops keep falling on my head, but that doesnt mean my eye will soon be turn in red.
Do a profolio for job reference
I am all of love, I am so lost without you
Eat eat eat eat is my hobby XDDDD
I am right here waiting for you,  No matter it takes, or how my breaks I will be right here waiting for you
Leave together in perfect, Harmony side by sidee on my piano
But I miss you finally, right from the start, my love make me back
I ve got a black magic woman, she makes me so blind i cant see, i ve got a black magic woman, she s trying make a devil out me
The honesty too much, and I have to close my eyes and hide, I wanna hold you till i die, till we both break down and cry
